title: Didn't receive mystery gift yet (NA)
body: From what most people are saying the majority of NA gifts have been rolled out but I seem to have been left in the dust. I was just wondering if this is for any reason because I met the qualifications of no bans and or restrictions for the entire 2014 season (that I know of).

replies.body: Not all the gifts are out yet.  There are a lot of you, and it takes time.  We did say it would take at least a few days to a week. :P

> [{quoted}](name=Hollymonster,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=75GQXEUb,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-01-09T19:26:43.470+0000)
>
> Not all the gifts are out yet.  There are a lot of you, and it takes time.  We did say it would take at least a few days to a week. :P

Thank you for the update; I was worried I had done something wrong and was thinking of how to repent.

1000 games of teemo play would have been too much to bare.
I hope Riot will send a message out once all the skins have been given, so some people don't get tortured. Hopefully it's a nice enough message to prevent raging lol ...

lol. I just told my friend this cause he keeps asking about his gift and constantly saying Riot is doing an April joke and think it's April.

[4:04] ChimeiTekinaNasu: "Not all the gifts are out yet. There are a lot of you, and it takes time. We did say it would take at least a few days to a week. :P"
damn. to a week. get rekt, kid
watch u be the last one getting urs
[4:04] Riven Pornstar: lol

Watch him get his last at the maximum time it'd take. >=D lol

> [{quoted}](name=Hollymonster,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=75GQXEUb,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-01-09T19:26:43.470+0000)
>
> Not all the gifts are out yet.  There are a lot of you, and it takes time.  We did say it would take at least a few days to a week. :P

I don't want to nit pick or anything, but the article said "over the next few days" didn't mention anything about the week. So thank you for the {{summoner:13}}
Yeah, just looked over the post again.  This is why I don't like time estimations, heh.

> [{quoted}](name=Hollymonster,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=75GQXEUb,comment-id=000200010000,timestamp=2015-01-09T20:40:05.951+0000)
>
> Yeah, just looked over the post again.  This is why I don't like time estimations, heh.

lol no doubt, but again I appreciate the update, relieved a bit of stress for myself and a friend of mine. We were both sitting here like "what did I do wrong?"
Thanks for the update much appreciated.

I really need help, i may just be dumb but, it said i got a mystery gift from riot today as i logged in, but when i went to try searching for it in my loot and crafts system i couldn't find it, i tried everything to look for it, please help.

hello, if im lvl 10 and i've never been baned or get my chat restricted and i only own 1 champion. You think that's the reason why i didn't received yet?
THANKS...

Hi **BestThreshNA1**,

You need to have 10 skins that are available to be gifted to you to be eligible for a mystery gift. As no single champion has 10 available skins, it's very likely that this is the reason you have not received the skin.
oh ;_; i see, thanks dude, now the only think i can do is cry about it :/
I have yet to receive a skin as well
I have not either. Same boat as you. Never banned or anything, not sure why. Perhaps still rolling out.
everyone needs to stop posting these threads and just wait like normal people :) you will get it in time if you qualify.
